com.github.jonathanxd.iutils.box

Interface IMutableBox<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - Type of value.
    All Superinterfaces:
    BaseBox<T>, java.lang.Comparable<BaseBox<T>>, UnknownBox<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    MutableBox

    public interface IMutableBox<T>
extends BaseBox<T>
    A box which the value which the box hold can be changed.
